description:
The Computer Science Resource Consortium (CSRC) Panel will be visiting class on 

  • Tuesday 2/15 at 11:00am
  • Wednesday 2/16 at 2:30pm

The panel consists of recruiters who will be interviewing and hiring VT Computer Science graduates, and this assignment is intended to consider questions that might be helpful during the interviews.   

Post one very clear and concrete question that you might ask the CSRC Panel.  

If you see a similar question already posted, you can alternatively comment, critique, or expand the question in order to improve it.


NOTES:
Questions that elicit useful answers often ask about specific memories, facts, stories, and history, rather than general feelings, impressions, and ideas. 
 
For example:
Weak:  Do you think that interviews are a good way of judging job applicants?


Better:  What is the last question you recall that made an impression and might have helped sway your decision about an applicant?
name: CSRC Panel Questions (All Sections) 2/15 and 2/16
